protocol.name: P-GSE26631-2
protocol.text: After transfer to soil plants were watered once a week either with 1L water for a tray containing 28 pot with 1 plant each or with 1L 200µM d-biotin. Samples were collected from rosette leaves of five week old plants and each sample was pooled from 5 individuals.

protocol.name: P-GSE26631-3
protocol.text: The seeds were stored at +4ºC, and were kept in the dark in water at +4ºC for 2 days before move to growth room. Seeds were then germinated on MS/2 (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO) plates and one-week-old seedlings transferred to soil (1:1 peat: vermiculite; Finnpeat B2, Kekkilä Oyj, Tuusula, Finland). The plants were grown in a growth room with a temperature of 23ºC (day)/19 ºC (night) and a relative humidity of 50-60%. The photoperiod was 12 h of light and 12 h of dark. The light intensity was 220-280 µmol s-2 m-2 .

protocol.name: P-GSE26631-4
protocol.text: Qiagen's RNeasy Plant mini kit's protocol according to the instructions of the manufacturer with additional precipitation step for the final eluate (1/10 vol 3 M NaAc pH 5.2 and 1 vol isopropanol added, incubation at -20 C for 2 h, centrifuge 13000 rpm 30 min, wash with 70% EtOH, drying, resuspension in DEPC treated MQ water. RNA integrity was checked with Agilent Bioanalyzer 2100 using Agilent RNA 6000 Pico Gene chips.

protocol.name: P-GSE26631-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared using Affymetrix Enzo Kit from 3 ug total RNA and performed at the NASC's International Affymetrix Service

protocol.name: P-GSE26631-6
protocol.text: Hybridisation was performed according to the Affymetrix GeneChip Technical Analysis Manual at the NASC's International Affymetrix Service

protocol.name: P-GSE26631-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Agilent 2500A GeneArray Scanner at the NASC's International Affymetrix Service

protocol.name: P-GSE26631-8
protocol.text: The data were analyzed with the R-package using AffylmGUI; Robust multiarray average (RMA) normalization has been performed.
